comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Photo taken by me during the semester I taught at Oklahoma State University; family was on the way to KC to visit my wife's mother.  This visit was important to my writing of the book on Air Midwest called Pioneer of the Third Level, which was later expanded into a 20 year history of the company.   I. E. Quastler
